item.description:
I'm getting out of shape, so I'm putting myself on a diet and am going to hit the track.

 

I haven't run in a while, and I'm getting over a bad cold, so it's not going to be a fast run.  You can go faster or slower if you'd like - since we'll be on a circular track, it's going to be pretty hard to fall behind or to get far ahead.

 

Last year, it took me a few months to go from having no running experience to running 3.1 miles in under 22 minutes (a pretty respectable time for non-runners).  Not only did I get into vastly better shape, but I felt a *lot* better too!

 

If you'd like to get into better shape and meet some local people, please join me at Gaudet School as we take advantage of their wonderful track.  Please note that the track is behind the school, off TURNER ROAD.  If you park at the address listed, you'll have to walk around the school to get to the track.  I highly suggest using the entrance off Turner road.

 

My cell is 401-699-7304, but I'm not going to be running with my phone.

 

 

Adam
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the guy with really short hair standing near the track entrance (behind the tennis court)
item.name: Getting in shape by running!
